text: G is group of order 51 (a) True; as proper subgroup will be of order 1, 3, 17.{as 13 & 17 are prime number} So, order of group is prime which means they will be cyclic. Also, a subgroup of only - identity element is also cyclic. (b) True; As cyclic group has property that we get exactly 1 sub group of every order possible. (c) False;As it is not mention that G is cyclic. (d) True; as number of divisors of 51 = 4. Answer: C
